text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Tsk, this number…… Did those kids get lost again?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Hello? Haah…… Stop crying, I can't understand you. So where are you now? …… Huh? By the river?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: …… Then you should see a traffic light. …… Yeah, just turn right. Yeah. Hahah… Do you see the stadium for the freestyle races now?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Haah……They better not think I'll always be there to help them…… geez.
